1.content:
Harry had been in tough spots before but this just takes the cake.

Now the one-intch-tall boy who lived is crawling out of the rob pocket of one of his students. He had been shrunk in a pontions class experment gone wrong and in manged to get into a pocket on smoeone's rob.

Now looking around on the bed along with the rob, he can tell he is in a slytherin's room. But the questions was whos? Looking around he couldn't really tell who's room it was but then he heard the door knob turn and his face turned to see that....
1.title: The start....

13.content:
Harry couldn't belive his luck. Not only was he an intch tall but he was also stuck in the room of Draco Malfoy. Mafloy, oof all people.

Harry couldn't think of anything to make this more worse but he soon found somthing when he noticed Draco was stripping down to nothing but his birthday suit and walkign up to the bed.

With a groan Draco took a seat on the bed and rubbed his stomach with a groan. " Oh, my stomach si killing me. Maybe Blasie is right and I just need some sleep."

With that he lied down right on top of our tiny hero and went to sleep.

Draco was comtforable but Harry on the other hand wasn't. He was squriming around when Malfoy rolled over ontop of him, leaving Harry...
13.title: Draco

info.description:
PLEASE ADD CHAPTERS!

After a mishape in potions class Harry is now stuch in the slytherin dorm. Will he make it out alvie?

Okay, guys, go nuts. I mean this. I only ask two things :

Rules :

1.) No three worded paragraphs.

2.) Use discription! Try to make it as real as you can!

3.) No weight gain!

4.) There can be feet but not too much. This is a vore/shrink story.

5.) Harry Can die.
Other than the above, go nuts! Have fun!
